data.content:
Gnar (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Gnar, the Missing Link, is a unique and fascinating champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As a yordle, Gnar possesses a dual nature, transforming between a cute and playful creature and a ferocious and powerful beast. The default skin represents Gnar in his natural state, showcasing his primal and untamed essence.

While the exact RP cost and release date of the default skin are not available, it is important to note that this skin is the base appearance of Gnar, meaning it is available to all players from the moment they unlock the champion.

The Story of Gnar's

Costume

Gnar's default skin perfectly captures his wild and untamed nature. In this appearance, Gnar is depicted as a small, furry creature with large eyes and a mischievous grin. He wears a simple loincloth and carries a wooden boomerang, showcasing his primitive lifestyle. The skin's color palette consists of earthy tones, reflecting Gnar's connection to nature.

While the default skin may seem simple compared to Gnar's other elaborate skins, it is a testament to his primal origins. It highlights his playful and curious personality, as well as his ability to transform into a fearsome beast when provoked.

Despite its simplicity, the default skin remains a popular choice among players who appreciate Gnar's original design and want to experience the champion in his most authentic form.

Gnar's Story and Role in League of Legends

Gnar's story within the League of Legends universe is as captivating as his appearance. He hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land known for its icy tundras and warring tribes. Gnar belongs to a race of yordles, small and magical creatures with a penchant for mischief.

However, Gnar is no ordinary yordle. He possesses a unique ability to transform into a massive and powerful creature known as Mega Gnar when overwhelmed by anger or danger. This transformation grants him increased strength, durability, and devastating area-of-effect abilities.

Gnar's dual nature makes him a versatile champion on the Summoner's Rift. In his normal form, Gnar relies on his agility and quickness to outmaneuver his opponents. He excels at harassing enemies from a distance with his boomerang and using his hyper mobility to dodge incoming attacks.

When Gnar transforms into Mega Gnar, he becomes a formidable tank and crowd control specialist. His abilities allow him to initiate team fights, disrupt enemy formations, and soak up damage for his team. His ultimate ability,

, can single-handedly turn the tide of a battle by stunning multiple enemies against walls.

However, Gnar's transformation is not without its drawbacks. After a certain period of time in his Mega Gnar form, he reverts back to his small and vulnerable state, leaving him temporarily unable to access his powerful abilities. This mechanic requires players to carefully manage Gnar's rage bar and strategically time his transformations for maximum impact.

In terms of lore, Gnar's story is intertwined with the larger narrative of the Freljord. He is a survivor of the ancient civilization known as the Watchers, who were defeated by the Iceborn warriors. Gnar's existence serves as a reminder of the dangers lurking beneath the frozen surface of the Freljord, and his presence in the game adds depth to the rich lore of League of Legends.

Explore Gnar's Appearances

If you're interested in discovering more about Gnar's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated Gnar page. From the playful and adorable Dino Gnar to the fearsome and majestic Gentleman Gnar, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience.

Whether you prefer Gnar in his default form or want to explore the different skins available, Gnar's versatility and captivating design make him a beloved champion among League of Legends players.

Gnar

Release Date: August 14, 2014

Gnar, the Missing Link, is a unique and fascinating champion in the world of League of Legends. With his adorable appearance and unpredictable nature, Gnar has captured the hearts of players since his release on August 14, 2014. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Gnar, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and discuss his significance in the game.

Background Story

Gnar's story begins in the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land known for its icy tundras and warring tribes. Long ago, a young yordle named Gnar stumbled upon a hidden cave while exploring the treacherous mountains. Inside the cave, he discovered a mysterious artifact known as the Boomerang of the Ancients. As Gnar reached out to touch the relic, he was engulfed in a surge of ancient magic, transforming him into a creature unlike any other.

Now trapped in a cyclical pattern of hibernation and awakening, Gnar experiences drastic shifts in his personality and physical form. In his dormant state, Gnar appears as an innocent and playful yordle, resembling a small child. However, when he awakens, he transforms into a massive and ferocious beast, unleashing his primal instincts upon anything in his path.

Gnar's duality is not only reflected in his appearance but also in his gameplay mechanics. As a champion, Gnar possesses two forms: Mini Gnar and Mega Gnar. In his Mini Gnar form, he is nimble and quick, relying on his boomerang and boulder toss to harass enemies from a safe distance. However, when Gnar's rage meter reaches its maximum capacity, he undergoes a transformation into Mega Gnar, gaining increased size, strength, and devastating area-of-effect abilities.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Gnar's unique playstyle offers a variety of strengths and weaknesses that players must consider when choosing him as their champion. In his Mini Gnar form, Gnar excels at kiting enemies, poking from a distance, and providing utility to his team. His boomerang allows him to harass opponents while simultaneously farming minions, making him a formidable laner. Additionally, Gnar's ability to hop off walls with his passive, Hyper, grants him exceptional mobility and escape potential.

However, Gnar's strength lies in his ability to transform into Mega Gnar. When his rage meter is full, Gnar can initiate team fights with his ultimate ability, GNAR!, which knocks up enemies in a large area and deals significant damage. Mega Gnar's abilities are devastating in team fights, allowing him to crowd control multiple enemies and turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

Despite his strengths, Gnar also has weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His transformation from Mini Gnar to Mega Gnar is predictable, as it is determined by his rage meter. Skilled opponents can exploit this window of vulnerability by engaging Gnar when he is in his weaker Mini Gnar form. Additionally, Gnar's reliance on his boomerang for damage makes him susceptible to champions who can dodge or block projectiles, such as Yasuo or Braum.

Gnar's Place in the Game

Gnar's unique playstyle and versatile kit make him a popular pick in both professional and casual play. His ability to adapt to different situations and playstyles allows players to utilize him in various roles, including top lane and occasionally as a jungler. Gnar's presence in the game adds an element of unpredictability and excitement, as players must constantly adapt to his shifting forms and playstyles.

Furthermore, Gnar's engaging lore and charming appearance have made him a fan-favorite among the League of Legends community. His adorable Mini Gnar form and fearsome Mega Gnar form provide a stark contrast that appeals to players of all ages. Whether you enjoy the thrill of transforming into a hulking beast or the satisfaction of outplaying opponents with precise boomerang throws, Gnar offers a unique and enjoyable experience for players of all skill levels.

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Gnar's skins. From the mischievous Dino Gnar to the futuristic Super Galaxy Gnar, each skin offers a fresh and exciting visual update to this lovable champion. Explore the various skins and find the perfect look to suit your playstyle.

In conclusion, Gnar is a captivating champion with a rich backstory, unique gameplay mechanics, and a significant presence in the League of Legends community. Whether you are drawn to his adorable Mini Gnar form or the raw power of his Mega Gnar transformation, Gnar offers a thrilling and versatile playstyle that is sure to keep players engaged and entertained.

Gnar (SSG Gnar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: May 4, 2017

Gnar, the adorable and ferocious yordle, has joined forces with the Samsung Galaxy team to bring you his SSG Gnar skin. This skin was released on May 4, 2017, and is available for purchase in the League of Legends store for 1350 RP. With its unique design and special effects, SSG Gnar is a must-have for any Gnar enthusiast or fan of the Samsung Galaxy team.

The SSG Gnar skin transforms our lovable yordle into a fearsome warrior ready to dominate the Rift. Gnar dons the iconic blue and white colors of the Samsung Galaxy team, complete with their logo emblazoned on his chest. The skin features new animations, sound effects, and particle effects that perfectly capture the essence of the Samsung Galaxy team's dominance.

When Gnar transforms into Mega Gnar, he becomes an even more imposing figure. His abilities are enhanced with new visual effects, making his attacks and abilities even more impactful. The SSG Gnar skin truly brings out the power and strength of this champion, allowing players to feel like they are part of the Samsung Galaxy team.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gnar and his place in the League of Legends universe. Gnar is a yordle who hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. He is a prehistoric creature known as a

and his playful and mischievous nature is balanced by his primal instincts and ferocious strength.

Gnar's story begins thousands of years ago when he was trapped in True Ice, a powerful substance that preserves him in a state of suspended animation. He was discovered by Nunu and Willump, who accidentally freed him from his icy prison. Gnar awoke in a world vastly different from the one he knew, and he quickly became a force to be reckoned with on the Rift.

In the game, Gnar is a versatile champion who can switch between two forms: Mini Gnar and Mega Gnar. In his Mini Gnar form, he is a ranged champion who excels at harassing enemies with his boomerang and boulder toss. He can also use his Hop ability to quickly reposition himself and escape danger. However, when Gnar's rage bar is full, he transforms into Mega Gnar, gaining increased health, attack damage, and crowd control abilities. In this form, he becomes a melee champion who can initiate team fights and disrupt the enemy team with his powerful abilities.

Gnar's strengths lie in his ability to adapt to different situations. His range and mobility in Mini Gnar form allow him to poke and kite enemies, while his tankiness and crowd control in Mega Gnar form make him a formidable frontline champion. He can be played in various roles, including top lane and jungle, and his versatility makes him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play.

Despite his strengths, Gnar also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. His transformation into Mega Gnar is temporary and can leave him vulnerable if not timed correctly. Additionally, his abilities have long cooldowns, requiring players to carefully manage their resources. Gnar's playstyle also requires good positioning and decision-making, as mistimed engages can result in his demise.

Overall, Gnar is a unique and exciting champion to play. His adorable appearance and playful personality make him a fan favorite, while his powerful abilities and versatility make him a force to be reckoned with on the Rift. Whether you're a fan of the Samsung Galaxy team or simply enjoy playing Gnar, the SSG Gnar skin is a fantastic addition to your collection.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Gnar's appearances, including the SSG Gnar skin. Explore the different skins and unleash the full potential of this lovable yordle in your League of Legends games.

Gnar (El León Gnar)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: August 14, 2014

Gnar, the adorable and ferocious yordle, has taken on a new form in the League of Legends universe with his

skin. This skin transforms Gnar into a majestic lion, showcasing his wild and untamed nature in a unique and captivating way. Released on August 14, 2014, this skin has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing Gnar and want to experience a different side of this lovable champion.

The

skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Gnar, replacing his usual appearance with that of a fearsome lion. Gnar's fur is now a vibrant golden color, with intricate patterns and details that highlight his regal stature. His eyes glow with an intense fiery gaze, reflecting his untamed spirit. The skin also features new animations, particle effects, and sound effects, all designed to enhance the overall experience of playing as Gnar.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the transformation animation when Gnar switches between his mini and mega forms. As Gnar grows in size and power, he undergoes a stunning metamorphosis, with his lion form becoming even more imposing and majestic. This transformation adds an extra layer of excitement and visual appeal to the gameplay, making it a delight for both Gnar players and their opponents.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gnar and his place in the League of Legends universe. Gnar is a yordle who hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with ice and snow. He is not your typical yordle, though. Gnar is a prehistoric creature known as a

who was frozen in True Ice for thousands of years.

When Gnar was accidentally thawed out, he found himself in a world vastly different from the one he knew. Confused and disoriented, Gnar struggled to adapt to the modern world, often causing chaos and destruction wherever he went. However, beneath his wild and unpredictable exterior, Gnar possesses a gentle and innocent heart, making him a lovable and endearing character.

In the game, Gnar is a versatile champion who can switch between his mini and mega forms, each with its own unique abilities and playstyle. In his mini form, Gnar is quick and agile, able to harass enemies from a distance and escape with ease. However, when Gnar's rage bar fills up, he transforms into his mega form, becoming a hulking beast with increased durability and devastating crowd control abilities.

Gnar's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and disrupt the enemy team. His mega form allows him to initiate team fights with his ultimate ability,

, which knocks up and stuns enemies in a large area. Additionally, Gnar's mini form provides him with excellent kiting and poke potential, making him a formidable opponent in the laning phase.

However, Gnar also has his weaknesses. His transformation between mini and mega forms is predictable, allowing skilled opponents to capitalize on his vulnerabilities during his mini form. Gnar's reliance on his rage bar also means that he needs to carefully manage his abilities and engage at the right time to maximize his impact in team fights.

Overall, Gnar is a beloved champion in the League of Legends community, known for his unique playstyle and adorable appearance. Whether you choose to play as the mischievous yordle or unleash the power of the

skin, you're in for an exciting and entertaining experience.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Gnar's various appearances, including the captivating
skin. Explore the different facets of this lovable champion and discover the joy of playing as Gnar in the League of Legends universe.

Gnar (Astronaut Gnar)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 23, 2015

Gnar, the adorable yordle champion in League of Legends, has taken a giant leap into the cosmos with his Astronaut Gnar skin. Released on July 23, 2015, this skin allows Gnar to explore the vastness of space while still maintaining his playful and mischievous nature.

The Astronaut Gnar skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a slightly more expensive option compared to other skins. However, the attention to detail and unique animations make it well worth the investment for Gnar enthusiasts and collectors.

The Story of Astronaut Gnar

In the alternate universe of Astronaut Gnar, our lovable yordle has become an intrepid space explorer. Equipped with a futuristic spacesuit, complete with a helmet and jetpack, Gnar is ready to embark on thrilling adventures among the stars.

The skin features Gnar in his Mini form, with his spacesuit adorned with various patches and badges, showcasing his achievements and experiences in space. His helmet is equipped with a transparent visor, allowing players to catch a glimpse of his mischievous grin as he bounces around the battlefield.

When Gnar transforms into his Mega form, he dons a larger, more imposing spacesuit. The suit is equipped with powerful thrusters, enabling Gnar to unleash devastating attacks on his enemies. His boomerang has been replaced with a high-tech energy disc, and his boulder toss now launches a meteor from the depths of space.

One of the standout features of the Astronaut Gnar skin is the unique recall animation. Gnar summons a miniature rocket ship, hops inside, and takes off into the sky, leaving a trail of stardust behind. It's a delightful and whimsical animation that perfectly captures Gnar's adventurous spirit.

Gnar's Story and Gameplay

Gnar, the Missing Link, is a champion known for his dual nature. He alternates between his Mini form, a cute and playful creature, and his Mega form, a hulking beast with immense strength. This transformation is triggered by Gnar's Rage bar, which fills up as he deals and receives damage.

In his Mini form, Gnar excels at harassing opponents with his boomerang and boulder toss abilities. He can also use his hop ability to quickly reposition himself and escape dangerous situations. Gnar's playful nature is evident in his voice lines and animations, making him a joy to play for those who enjoy a mischievous playstyle.

When Gnar reaches full Rage, he transforms into his Mega form, gaining increased health, attack damage, and crowd control abilities. In this form, Gnar becomes a formidable tank and initiator, capable of stunning multiple enemies with his ultimate ability, GNAR!

Gnar's unique playstyle and transformation mechanics make him a versatile champion who can adapt to different situations. Whether you prefer to play aggressively in his Mini form or initiate team fights in his Mega form, Gnar offers a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.

Throughout his journey in League of Legends, Gnar has become a beloved champion among players. His adorable appearance, combined with his unique gameplay mechanics, has made him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Gnar's appearances, including his base skin and various other skins. Whether you're a fan of the Astronaut Gnar skin or interested in exploring Gnar's other cosmetic options, this page serves as a comprehensive resource for all things Gnar.

So, strap on your spacesuit and join Gnar on his cosmic adventures with the Astronaut Gnar skin. Whether you're bouncing around the Rift in his Mini form or unleashing havoc as a Mega beast, Gnar is sure to bring a smile to your face with his playful antics and out-of-this-world charm.

Gnar (Gentleman Gnar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: February 5, 2015

Gentleman Gnar, the refined and sophisticated skin for the adorable yordle Gnar, brings a touch of class and elegance to the chaotic world of League of Legends. This dapper skin transforms Gnar into a true gentleman, complete with a top hat, monocle, and a stylish suit. Released on February 5, 2015, this skin quickly became a fan favorite, offering players a unique and charming take on the lovable champion.

As Gnar leaps into battle, he does so with grace and poise, showcasing his refined manners even in the heat of combat. His boomerang is replaced with a cane, and his boulder toss becomes a well-dressed gentleman's umbrella. The transformation from Mini Gnar to Mega Gnar is equally impressive, as he dons a dashing tuxedo and exudes an air of sophistication.

The Gentleman Gnar skin not only changes Gnar's appearance but also adds new animations and sound effects. With each ability, players can enjoy the satisfying clink of a cane or the sound of an umbrella opening. The attention to detail in this skin truly brings the concept of a gentleman to life, making it a must-have for Gnar enthusiasts and collectors alike.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gnar and his place in the world of League of Legends. Gnar is a yordle, a small and furry creature known for their mischievous nature. However, Gnar is not your typical yordle. He is a prehistoric creature who was frozen in True Ice for thousands of years, only to be thawed out in the present day. This makes Gnar the only known yordle from a bygone era.

Gnar's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he once roamed the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. His primal instincts and incredible strength make him a formidable opponent on the battlefield. Gnar's unique ability is his ability to transform between Mini Gnar and Mega Gnar, each form offering different strengths and weaknesses.

In his Mini Gnar form, Gnar is quick and nimble, able to dart around the battlefield and harass his enemies with his boomerang. His playful nature and small size make him difficult to catch, allowing him to outmaneuver his opponents. However, Mini Gnar lacks the raw power and durability of his Mega Gnar form.

When Gnar reaches his Rage bar's maximum capacity, he transforms into Mega Gnar, a hulking beast with immense strength and crowd control abilities. Mega Gnar can stun multiple enemies with his ultimate ability,

, and wreak havoc in team fights. However, Mega Gnar's size and slower movement speed make him an easier target for enemies to focus on.

Gnar's unique playstyle and transformation mechanic make him a versatile champion who can adapt to different situations. Whether players prefer the nimble and elusive Mini Gnar or the powerful and disruptive Mega Gnar, Gnar offers a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.

With the release of the Gentleman Gnar skin, players can now enjoy playing as this charming yordle in style. Whether you're a fan of Gnar's lore, his gameplay mechanics, or simply enjoy collecting skins, Gentleman Gnar is a fantastic addition to any player's collection.

For more information about Gnar and his various appearances, including the Gentleman Gnar skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this lovable champion. Watch videos, explore his abilities, and discover the many ways you can unleash Gnar's fury on the Rift.

Gnar (Elderwood Gnar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 24, 2015

Gnar, the adorable yet ferocious yordle, has taken on a new form in the mystical realm of Elderwood. With the release of the

skin on September 24, 2015, players can now experience Gnar's transformation into a majestic creature of the forest. This skin, priced at 1350 RP, offers a unique and captivating visual experience for League of Legends players.

The

skin presents Gnar as a woodland spirit, embodying the essence of nature. His appearance is adorned with vibrant green leaves, intricate bark patterns, and glowing magical energy. This skin truly captures the ethereal beauty and mysticism of the Elderwood theme, making Gnar a captivating sight on the Summoner's Rift.

Not only does

offer a visually stunning transformation, but it also brings new animations and effects to Gnar's abilities. His boomerang and boulder toss are replaced with swirling leaves and enchanted stones, while his hyper and wallop abilities showcase the raw power of nature. The ultimate ability, GNAR!, summons a massive tree to crash down upon his enemies, leaving them in awe of his primal might.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gnar and his place in the League of Legends universe. Gnar is a yordle who hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. Long ago, Gnar was trapped in True Ice, a powerful substance that preserved him for thousands of years. When he finally broke free, he found himself in a world vastly different from the one he knew.

Gnar's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once a part of a powerful and ancient race known as the

These beings were closely connected to nature and possessed immense magical abilities. However, as time passed, the Elderwood faded away, leaving only remnants of their existence.

With the

skin, players can witness Gnar's connection to his ancestral roots. As he transforms into an Elderwood creature, he taps into the ancient magic that flows through his veins. This skin not only showcases Gnar's power but also pays homage to the forgotten Elderwood race.

In the game, Gnar is a unique champion who possesses both a ranged and melee form. In his ranged form, Gnar hurls boomerangs and uses his abilities to poke and harass enemies from a safe distance. However, as his rage meter fills, Gnar undergoes a transformation, turning into a hulking beast in his melee form.

Gnar's strengths lie in his ability to control team fights with his crowd control abilities. His ultimate ability, GNAR!, can single-handedly turn the tide of a battle by stunning multiple enemies and displacing them. Additionally, Gnar's mobility allows him to engage or disengage fights with ease, making him a versatile champion in the top lane.

However, Gnar also has his weaknesses. His transformation from ranged to melee form is predictable, and experienced opponents can take advantage of this window of vulnerability. Gnar's abilities also have relatively high cooldowns, requiring careful management to maximize his effectiveness in fights. Additionally, Gnar's reliance on his rage meter means that he needs to carefully balance his aggression to avoid being caught out in a vulnerable state.

Overall, Gnar is a beloved champion in the League of Legends community, known for his adorable appearance and powerful gameplay. With the

skin, players can now experience Gnar's connection to the ancient Elderwood race and witness his transformation into a majestic woodland spirit.

For more information about Gnar and his various appearances, including the

skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Gnar on the League of Legends website. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the world of Gnar and his captivating story.

Gnar (Snow Day Gnar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 10, 2014

Gnar, the adorable and ferocious yordle, has received a chilly makeover with his Snow Day Gnar skin. This winter-themed skin was released on December 10, 2014, and has since become a favorite among League of Legends players. With its unique design and playful animations, Snow Day Gnar brings a touch of frosty fun to the Rift.

Snow Day Gnar transforms our lovable prehistoric yordle into a snowball-throwing, snowman-building champion. Gnar himself is dressed in cozy winter attire, complete with a fluffy hat, scarf, and mittens. His boomerang has been replaced with a snow shovel, and his boulder toss ability now hurls a giant snowball at his enemies. Additionally, his ultimate ability, GNAR!, summons a massive snowball to knock back his foes.

The attention to detail in Snow Day Gnar is truly remarkable. As Gnar hops around the battlefield, he leaves behind a trail of snowy footprints. When he transforms into Mega Gnar, he becomes an enormous snow monster, complete with icicles hanging from his body. His abilities are accompanied by delightful sound effects, such as the crunch of snow under his feet and the satisfying thud of a snowball hitting its target.

Snow Day Gnar also features unique recall animations. When Gnar recalls, he builds a snowman and then playfully knocks it down before returning to the fountain. This adds an extra touch of whimsy to the skin and showcases Gnar's mischievous nature.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gnar himself. Gnar is a yordle who hails from the Freljord, a frozen and treacherous land in the world of Runeterra. He is a prehistoric creature known as a

and his playful and curious nature often gets him into trouble.

Gnar's past in the game is closely tied to his lore. He was once trapped in True Ice, a powerful substance that preserved him for thousands of years. When he was finally freed, he found himself in a world vastly different from the one he knew. Gnar's abilities reflect his dual nature. In his normal form, he is a nimble and agile champion, capable of throwing his boomerang and catching it on its return. However, when his rage meter fills, he transforms into Mega Gnar, a hulking beast with devastating area-of-effect abilities.

In the game, Gnar is primarily played in the top lane as a ranged champion. His ability to harass opponents from a distance and escape with his hop ability makes him a formidable laner. Gnar's ultimate ability, GNAR!, can turn the tide of team fights by stunning multiple enemies and disrupting their positioning. However, Gnar's transformation is not without its drawbacks. Players must carefully manage his rage meter to ensure they transform at the right time and avoid becoming a liability to their team.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Gnar's appearances, including his base skin and other alternate skins. Whether you prefer the adorable Snow Day Gnar or want to explore his other personas, this page is your one-stop destination for all things Gnar.

Gnar (Dino Gnar)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 14, 2014

Gnar, the adorable and ferocious yordle, has always been a fan favorite in League of Legends. With his playful nature and powerful abilities, Gnar has captured the hearts of players around the world. And now, with the release of the

skin, players can experience a whole new level of cuteness and excitement with this prehistoric-themed costume.

The Dino Gnar skin transforms our lovable yordle into a tiny dinosaur, complete with scaly green skin, a tail, and a set of sharp teeth. This skin truly brings out the primal side of Gnar, showcasing his wild and untamed nature. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, with every aspect of Gnar's appearance reflecting the essence of a dinosaur. From his tiny arms to his fierce expression, Dino Gnar is a sight to behold.

But the visual changes are not the only thing that makes the Dino Gnar skin special. The skin also features unique animations and sound effects that further enhance the prehistoric theme. Gnar's boomerang transforms into a bone, his boulder becomes a giant egg, and his ultimate ability, GNAR!, summons a massive meteorite. These small touches add an extra layer of immersion and make playing as Dino Gnar an absolute delight.

Now, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Gnar and his place in the League of Legends universe. Gnar is a yordle who hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land filled with ice and snow. Long ago, Gnar was trapped in True Ice, a powerful substance that preserved him for thousands of years. When he finally broke free, he found himself in a world vastly different from the one he knew.

Gnar's past in the game is closely tied to his transformation mechanic. Gnar has two forms: Mini Gnar and Mega Gnar. In his Mini Gnar form, he is a small and agile yordle who excels at ranged attacks and mobility. But as time passes and Gnar builds up his rage, he transforms into Mega Gnar, a hulking beast with immense strength and crowd control abilities. This unique mechanic adds depth to Gnar's gameplay and allows players to adapt to different situations.

In the game, Gnar is primarily played in the top lane as a tanky bruiser. His ability to engage fights and disrupt the enemy team makes him a valuable asset in team compositions. Gnar's strengths lie in his crowd control abilities, such as his ultimate ability, GNAR!, which can stun multiple enemies and turn the tide of a team fight. However, Gnar's reliance on his transformation mechanic can also be a weakness, as mistiming his transformation can leave him vulnerable and unable to contribute effectively.

Overall, Gnar is a versatile and exciting champion to play, and the Dino Gnar skin adds a whole new level of fun to his gameplay. Whether you're a fan of dinosaurs or simply enjoy playing as a cute and powerful yordle, the Dino Gnar skin is a must-have for any Gnar enthusiast.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing the various appearances of Gnar, including the Dino Gnar skin. Explore the different skins and discover the many ways you can unleash Gnar's primal power on the Rift!

Gnar (La Ilusión Gnar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 5, 2015

Gnar, the adorable and ferocious yordle, has captured the hearts of League of Legends players since his release. With his unique transformation mechanic, Gnar can switch between being a cute and playful creature to a hulking beast, wreaking havoc on the Rift. And now, Gnar has a new skin that adds a touch of magic and illusion to his already captivating character - La Ilusión Gnar.

La Ilusión Gnar is a 1350 RP skin that was released on November 5, 2015. This skin takes Gnar's transformation to a whole new level, incorporating elements of illusion and enchantment into his appearance. With vibrant colors and mesmerizing effects, La Ilusión Gnar is a must-have for any Gnar enthusiast.

Let's delve into the details of this captivating skin. In his mini form, Gnar dons a colorful jester outfit, complete with a pointed hat adorned with bells. His fur is a vibrant purple, and his eyes glow with an otherworldly energy. As Gnar transforms into his mega form, he becomes a towering illusionist, with a long, flowing cape and a staff that crackles with magical energy. The transformation itself is a spectacle to behold, as Gnar's body shimmers and morphs, leaving behind a trail of sparkling particles.

But the visual enhancements are not the only thing that makes La Ilusión Gnar special. This skin also features unique sound effects that further immerse players in the world of illusion. From the tinkling of bells to the crackling of magic, every ability and movement is accompanied by a fitting auditory experience. The attention to detail in this skin truly brings Gnar's magical persona to life.

Now, let's take a step back and explore the story of Gnar himself. Gnar is a prehistoric yordle who was frozen in True Ice for thousands of years. He was discovered by a group of Piltovian explorers who accidentally thawed him out. Gnar's awakening unleashed his primal fury, and he rampaged through the Freljord, seeking revenge on those who had disturbed his slumber.

In the game, Gnar is a unique champion who excels at disrupting team fights and controlling the battlefield. His passive ability, Rage Gene, allows him to transform into his mega form after accumulating enough rage. In his mini form, Gnar is nimble and elusive, able to harass enemies with his boomerang and hop away to safety. In his mega form, Gnar becomes a tanky brawler, capable of initiating fights and stunning multiple enemies with his ultimate ability, GNAR!

Gnar's strengths lie in his ability to adapt to different situations. His transformation mechanic allows him to switch between ranged and melee forms, giving him versatility in both laning phase and team fights. In his mini form, Gnar can poke and harass enemies from a safe distance, while his mega form provides crowd control and disruption. Gnar's mobility and crowd control make him a valuable asset in team compositions that prioritize engaging and locking down key targets.

However, Gnar also has his weaknesses. His transformation is tied to his rage bar, which means that players need to carefully manage their rage to ensure they transform at the right time. Gnar's mini form is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable to all-ins from champions with high burst damage. Additionally, Gnar's abilities have long cooldowns, so mistiming his engages or missing crucial abilities can leave him vulnerable and ineffective.

In the world of League of Legends, Gnar has become a beloved champion with a unique playstyle and an endearing personality. His story of awakening from a deep slumber and seeking revenge resonates with players, and his transformation mechanic adds an extra layer of depth to his gameplay. Whether you prefer the playful and mischievous mini Gnar or the hulking and powerful mega Gnar, there is no denying the impact this yordle has had on the game.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Gnar's appearances, including the enchanting La Ilusión Gnar skin. Explore the world of Gnar and discover the joy of playing this lovable and fierce champion.

Gnar (Super Galaxy Gnar)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 10, 2015

Gnar, the adorable and ferocious yordle, has joined the ranks of the Super Galaxy universe with his epic skin, Super Galaxy Gnar. This skin transforms Gnar into a high-tech, space-faring hero, ready to battle against evil forces threatening the galaxy. With its vibrant colors, futuristic design, and unique animations, Super Galaxy Gnar is a must-have skin for any fan of this lovable champion.

Super Galaxy Gnar was released on July 10, 2015, and quickly became a fan favorite. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Gnar, giving players a fresh and exciting experience while playing as this champion.

Super Galaxy Gnar: A Cosmic Adventure

In the Super Galaxy universe, Gnar takes on the role of a heroic space explorer, fighting against the forces of darkness that threaten the galaxy. Equipped with a high-tech suit and armed with powerful energy weapons, Super Galaxy Gnar is ready to unleash his cosmic powers on the battlefield.

The skin features a vibrant color palette, with shades of blue, purple, and pink dominating Gnar's appearance. His suit is adorned with glowing energy lines, giving him a futuristic and otherworldly look. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, with intricate patterns and designs covering Gnar's entire body.

Super Galaxy Gnar's recall animation is a sight to behold. When Gnar recalls, a massive spaceship descends from the sky, engulfing him in a beam of light and whisking him away to safety. This animation perfectly captures the essence of Gnar's cosmic adventure, adding an extra layer of immersion to the skin.

Furthermore, Super Galaxy Gnar features unique ability animations and sound effects. When Gnar transforms into his Mega form, his abilities take on a more explosive and powerful appearance. The boomerang he throws becomes a futuristic energy disc, and his ultimate ability, GNAR!, creates a massive shockwave that sends enemies flying. These visual and auditory enhancements make playing as Super Galaxy Gnar an exhilarating experience.

Gnar: The Adorable Yet Fierce Yordle

Gnar, the prehistoric yordle, made his debut in League of Legends on August 14, 2014. He quickly became a fan favorite due to his unique playstyle and adorable appearance. Gnar is a versatile champion who can switch between his Mini and Mega forms, each with its own set of abilities.

In his Mini form, Gnar is a nimble and ranged champion, able to harass enemies from a safe distance. His Q ability, Boomerang Throw, allows him to throw a boomerang that damages and slows enemies, while his W ability, Hyper, empowers his basic attacks with bonus damage. Gnar's E ability, Hop, allows him to quickly dash away or towards enemies, making him a slippery target to catch.

When Gnar's rage bar is full, he transforms into his Mega form, becoming a massive tank with devastating crowd control abilities. In this form, Gnar gains bonus health, armor, and magic resist, making him incredibly durable. His Q ability, Boulder Toss, allows him to throw a massive boulder that damages and slows enemies, while his W ability, Wallop, stuns enemies in a small area. Gnar's ultimate ability, GNAR!, is a game-changer, as he leaps into the air and slams the ground, knocking up and damaging all enemies in a large area.

Gnar's playstyle revolves around managing his rage bar and strategically timing his transformations to maximize his impact in team fights. Skilled Gnar players can utilize his range and crowd control abilities to control the flow of battles and set up kills for their team.

With his Super Galaxy Gnar skin, this lovable yordle takes on a whole new persona, becoming a cosmic hero fighting for justice in the Super Galaxy universe. Whether you're a fan of Gnar or simply enjoy collecting epic skins, Super Galaxy Gnar is a fantastic addition to your League of Legends collection.

For more information about Gnar and his various appearances, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit our dedicated Gnar page on the League of Legends website.
